name: From World 1, With Love
description:
The mythical World 1 faces a bizarre attack that threatens the stability of all other derivative Worlds. It is up to Agent Pontius to protect this primal place by saving as many of its inhabitants as possible.

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Space to jump.

E to interact.

Created by Kapricorn Media

Luciano Obregón (Art)
